author: Joseph Guzman
title: Bill Gates is spending billions to produce 7 potential coronavirus vaccines | TheHill - The Hill
description: Bill Gates is spending billions to produce 7 potential coronavirus vaccines | TheHill The Hill Bill Gates is funding factories for 7 coronavirus vaccine candidates - Business Insider Business Insider Bill Gates On Coronavirus: "I Can Hardly Believe We're In T…
content:
Microsoft founder and billionaire philanthropist Bill Gates said his foundation is funding the construction of factories that will manufacture seven promising coronavirus vaccines.
